Topic.Title: A question for Alex about Basix

Posts.EditableText: Hello! I am searching for the basix magazines to add to my collection on the net! The only issue i am missing is issue 14... Do you happen to have it? btw, if you wish you can check out all the magazines i found so far at: http://www.petesqbsite.com/sections/zines/zines.shtml Petes of Petes qb site has graciously given the magazines space on the new Petes QB site, and issue 14 of the basix magazines is one of the ones that we are looking for... thanks for your time! Barok

Posts.EditableText: Unfortunately I don't have a copy of issue 14 - I only have up to issue 13, which is the last issue I edited. Sorry!
